ygData.subject: Re: I hate figuring out these riddles can someone  please spell...
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of weird things in ak anon, have you ever been to that room in the king s palace that has the glowing white diagram on the floor with a rather low
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of weird things in ak'anon, have you ever been to that room in the
king's palace that has the glowing white diagram on the floor with a rather
low level clockwork spider standing on it? I'm a lvl 22 gnome rogue, and
thats the only clockwork spider in town that cons green to me. Plus that
glowing white design on the floor is unlike anything I've ever seen in
ak'anon. I played a dark elf once, and this design is very much like the
glowing neon designs in neriak. I was considering trying to kill that
clockwork, but there's a blood red clockwork guard in the room opposite and
was afraid it might join in. (not to mention all the other guards in the
palace) :) I also tried hailing the clockwork and clicking all over
everything in that room and didn't find anything. One thing I didn't try
was getting someone to click on the rotateing star while I was in that room
to see if something happens.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

> > different amounts of water can cause a different (not necessarily good)
>
> There is also the allusion to a storage cavern in akanon. My theory
> is that the rotating star thingy opens the door to the cavern and
> someone figured it all out this weekend.
